long_description: The ultralight Marmot Kompressor Verve 42 Pack sports a simple, clean and functional design that comfortably carries everything you need for a ultralight adventure weekend. Ventilated suspension with multidirectional foam promotes cooling airflow and helps ensure your comfort while you haul up to 2 or 3 days' worth of gear. Perforated polyethylene framesheet and lightweight aluminum frame support the load and effectively transfer weight to the hipbelt. Top-loading main compartment features zippered side access as well so you can easily get to buried gear. Hydration port and clip let you add a reservoir for on-the-go hydration (reservoir sold separately). Padded hipbelt features 2 zippered pockets for a camera, GPS or snacks; mesh bottle pockets, top zippered pocket and large front stash pocket organize and access essentials. The Marmot Kompressor Verve 42 Pack features reflective dual hiking pole/tool loops that stow away when not in use.
short_description: The ultralight Marmot Kompressor Verve 42 Pack sports a simple, clean and functional design that comfortably carries everything you need for a ultralight adventure weekend.
